languages.text: "Какое чудесное возвращение в лоно веры. Измельчали культисты, ничего не скажешь".
"A truly miraculous return into the fold of the faith. Cultists these days..."
languages.original_text: "Какое чудесное возвращение в лоно веры. Измельчали культисты, ничего не скажешь".

languages.text: “这个邪教徒奇迹般地回归了信仰的怀抱，现在的邪教徒可真是……”
languages.original_text: "A truly miraculous return into the fold of the faith. Cultists these days..."

traits.locale_text: “这个邪教徒奇迹般地回归了信仰的怀抱，现在的邪教徒可真是……”

languages.text: «Un regreso milagroso al rebaño de la fe. Los cultistas de hoy en día...».
languages.original_text: "A truly miraculous return into the fold of the faith. Cultists these days..."

traits.locale_text: «Un regreso milagroso al rebaño de la fe. Los cultistas de hoy en día...».

languages.text: « Un remarquable retour à la foi véritable. Les fanatiques, de nos jours... »
languages.original_text: "A truly miraculous return into the fold of the faith. Cultists these days..."

languages.text: 「まったく奇跡的な信仰の懐への帰還だ。今どきのカルト信者どもは…」
languages.original_text: "A truly miraculous return into the fold of the faith. Cultists these days..."

traits.locale_text: 「まったく奇跡的な信仰の懐への帰還だ。今どきのカルト信者どもは…」

languages.text: "İnancın yoluna ani bir dönüş... Şu günümüz tarikatçıları yok mu..."
languages.original_text: "A truly miraculous return into the fold of the faith. Cultists these days..."

traits.locale_text: "İnancın yoluna ani bir dönüş... Şu günümüz tarikatçıları yok mu..."

languages.text: "Eine wahrhaft wundersame Rückkehr in den Schoß des Glaubens. Diese Kultisten von heute ..."
